examples.korean: a bottle with a screw top 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뚜껑을 비틀어[돌려서] 열게 되어 있는 병 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a bottle with a screw top Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She managed to wrench herself free. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 간신히 몸을 확 비틀어 빠져나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She managed to wrench herself free. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She used a knife to prise open the lid. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 칼을 써서 뚜껑을 비틀어 열었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She used a knife to prise open the lid. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I twisted off the lid and looked inside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 뚜껑을 비틀어 열고 안을 들여다보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I twisted off the lid and looked inside. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He prised her fingers from the bag and took it from her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀의 손가락을 비틀어 그 가방을 그녀에게서 빼앗았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He prised her fingers from the bag and took it from her. Add to Wordbook
